attributes.action: schools should all have the same holidays
attributes.additional_details:
I am creating this petition as I have 3 children two at high school and one still in primary, they have always had the same holidays but for some reason Cherry Tree primary school have decided this May half term they will not be having the same holidays as all other schools and my two eldest are now off for a week and my youngest isn't breaking up until the 6th June 2014.

I had planned to take my children on a short break this week but as for the school changing their holidays I was unable to do this as I could possibly get fined which would be uncalled for.

I would be very grateful if you could sign this epetition so help other parents in the same position as myself and other parents who's children go to the same schools as mine and any other schools that are doing the same.
